    MainPane

    An empty texture with the dimensions of Width and Height on which the components gets rendered.
    After that it gets copied on top the screen at X and Y.

    Declaration
    public Texture MainPane { get; }
    Property Value

    Draw(ref Renderer, in float)

    Draw here on the component. Position 0,0 is the top-left corner and Width + Height are the bottom-right corner.

    Render(ref Renderer, in float, bool)

    Internal logic for rendering the component.
    This method also calls Draw(ref Renderer), which is where the actual drawing takes place.

    Declaration
    public virtual void Render(ref Renderer renderer, in float deltaTime, bool drawOnScreen = true)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Renderer renderer

    The current instance of the GameWindow's renderer
    float deltaTime

    Delta time since last frame
    bool drawOnScreen

    TRUE if you also want to draw the component to the screen.
    FALSE to only draw to MainPane.
    | Edit this page View Source

    ShouldRedraw()

    The component gets only redrawn, if this method returns true.

    Declaration
    public virtual bool ShouldRedraw()
    Returns
    Type Description
    bool

    Return true to redraw. If nothing changed since the last redraw, return false.
